name: Mr Mess
description:
Download Instructions

  • Please use the following link for downloading the game if the link below does not work: https://drive.google.com/open?id=18BGMfoYdSORFOvPvJM3AmmBwk45133oH
  • On the google drive, press the download button shown at the top right. 

Controls

Keyboard

  • Move using the W S A D keys. 
  • Press Spacebar or Left Mouse Click to attack and purchase items after every round. 
  • Arrow keys to rotate around. 
  • ESC key to exit game. 

Xbox Controller

  • Left stick to move around. 
  • Right stick to rotate viewing direction. 
  • Right/Left Trigger to attack and purchase items and proceed through main menu.
